Patent Information.Patent Title: Broad spectrum antimicrobial peptides containing a tryptophan triplet and methods of use.
Patent Information.Abstract: Peptides exhibiting antibacterial and/or antifungal activity are provided which comprise a tryptophan triplet and are between 10-34 amino acid residues in length. Pharmaceutical and non-pharmaceutical compositions containing the peptides, as well as methods of using the peptides as antimicrobials are also disclosed.

Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide 3 (Trp- and Arg-rich; derivative of Tritrpticin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas, Klebsiella, Proteus species;Gram-positive bacteria:Streptococcus, Staphylococcus species.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activiy against Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of a 13 amino acid tryptophan-rich peptide derived from a putative porcine precursor protein of a novel family of antibacterial peptides.
Literature.Author: Lawyer C, Pai S, Watabe M, Borgia P, Mashimo T, Eagleton L, Watabe K.
